attributes.action: celebrate the life of pallah, pali. inderpal, harpal etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hello all, it has come to my attention that a figure within our community is one generous man, therefore i ask you to sign this petition to set aside a day for this wonderful man and to celebrate his being on this planet we call EARTH.

rejection.details: Your petition is unclear. Please be more specific.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
